text: Wilfredo Méndez (born 10 November 1996) is a Puerto Rican professional boxer who has held the WBO mini flyweight title since 2019. ==Professional career== Méndez turned professional in 2016 and compiled a record of 13-1 before facing and defeating Filipino Boxer Vic Saludar, to win the WBO mini flyweight title. ==Professional boxing record== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;
